briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety of Cadazolid Versus Vancomycin in Subjects With Clostridium Difficile - Associated Diarrhea
officialTitle: A Multi-center, Randomized, Double-blind Study to Compare the Efficacy and Safety of Cadazolid Versus Vancomycin in Subjects With Clostridium Difficile-associated Diarrhea (CDAD)
summary: This clinical study is conducted to assess the efficacy of cadazolid compared to vancomycin in subjects with Clostridium difficile-associated diarrhea (CDAD).

primaryOutcome.measure: Clinical Cure Rate (CCR) in the Modified Intent-to-treat Population
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Up to Day 12 on average (end-of-treatment + 2 days)
